title: Performance of Predefined Search Patterns for Identifying Documented Goals-of-Care Discussions in Inpatient Electronic Health Records

abstract: Objective: To characterize the sensitivity and predictive value of predefined search terms for identifying documented goals-of-care discussions in health records of hospitalized patients with serious illness. Methods: We evaluated the performance of …
